CustomField.description: Identifies account type for StartTrack sub accounts (provisioned in TEAMS). Not used for accounts Follower - This account will pay it's own invoice; Offspring of Leader - Leader will pay invoice for this sub account; Offspring of Follower - The chosen follower account will pay the invoice.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Follower Only - This account will pay it's own invoice; Offspring - The chosen parent (Leader or another Follower) will pay the invoice.
CustomField.label: Account Type

value.label: Offspring of Follower (Parent under same Leader)
